Package com.example.snackoverflow

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.snackoverflow.Recipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable
    public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, android.os.Parcelable
    Recipe class encapsulates an object for the recipe type where it contains a title (description), time to prep, number of servings, category, instructions, comments, ingredients required for recipe. It also stores intricate details like id of firebase document and the image
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Recipe

        public Recipe​(java.lang.String title,
              int prepTime,
              float servings,
              java.lang.String category,
              java.lang.String comments,
              java.lang.String instructions,
              java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients)
        Constructor for initializing recipes with basic information
        Parameters:
        title - a string describing the ingredient
        prepTime - an integer specifying the time it takes to prep the meal
        servings - a float defining the number of people it can serve
        category - a string describing what category the recipe is is
        comments - a string containing general comments about the recipe the user may have
        instructions - a string containing instructions to prepare the recipe
        ingredients - an arraylist with ingredients that the recipe needs

      • Recipe

        public Recipe​(java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.String title,
              int prepTime,
              float servings,
              java.lang.String category,
              java.lang.String comments,
              java.lang.String instructions,
              @Nullable
              android.graphics.Bitmap imgBitmap)
        Constructor for initializing recipes with basic information
        Parameters:
        id - a string containing the id of the recipe in firebase
        title - a string describing the ingredient
        prepTime - an integer specifying the time it takes to prep the meal
        servings - a float defining the number of people it can serve
        category - a string describing what category the recipe is is
        comments - a string containing general comments about the recipe the user may have
        instructions - a string containing instructions to prepare the recipe
        imgBitmap - the image for the recipe stored as a bitmap
